fields.name: Smoked & Salted
fields.ingredient_1: .25 oz maple syrup (slightly thinned out with hot water ahead of time)
fields.method: Stir with ice to chill and dilute. Strain into a double rocks glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange twist

fields.name: Giro d'Italia
fields.method: Muddle tomatoes and four basil leaves. Add other ingredients and shake over ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass with ice. Garnish with a basil leaf.

fields.name: The Golden Dram
fields.ingredient_1: 1 sugar cube soaked in Angostura bitters
fields.method: In a champagne flute, soak sugar cube with 3 good dashes of bitters. Add Aberfeldy single malt and then top with Prosecco.

fields.name: Monarch Manhattan
fields.method: Combine all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass and stir. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

fields.name: Monkey Colada
fields.method: In a blender, combine ingredients and blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

fields.name: A Place In The Sun
fields.method: Shake, strain into rocks glass with fresh ice, gently layer in red wine cordial, which, because it's denser, will layer on the bottom of the glass. Garnish with an orange peel. *Red wine cordial: In a saucepan over medium heat, simmer a bottle of Shiraz or other bright, juicy red wine with 1 cup orange juice, 2 cinnamon sticks, .5 cup sweet vermouth, .5 cup pomegranate grenadine, and .25 cup smoked maple syrup. Alternatively substitute Martini & Rosso Rubino, Madeira, or a Carcavelos for cordial.

fields.name: Casanova
fields.method: Build all ingredients into a small toddy mug and top with the cinnamon-lemon infused hot water, add garnish, and serve.

fields.name: Hanzo Steel
fields.method: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Top with ice and stir. Strain and serve down (no ice) into a chilled Old Fashioned glass. Garnish with an expressed lemon peel, resting across the rim of glass. *Honey syrup: Use a 1:1 ratio of good quality honey to warm water. Stir till fully integrated.
